records.name: Dhawa Ihuru, Part Of Banyan Group

descriptions.general: General description: The hotel Dhawa Ihuru is located in the vicinity of its own sandy beach. At the beach, there are sun loungers free of charge. The town Male is around 17 km away. For medical treatment in emergencies there is a hospital around 17 km away. The airport (MLE) is approx. 26 km away. The hotel and airport are linked by a shuttle (for a fee) 24 h a day. Amenities: The resort has 45 rooms. It offers its guests a 24h reception (check-in from 14:00, check-out until 11:00), a lobby, air conditioning, a safe (where applicable, for a fee) and a money changing facility. For the meals, there is a restaurant. You can relax in good company in the hotel bar. WiFi is available for free. Room service and laundry / ironing service are available for a fee. Meals: Breakfast from the buffet. Half board: breakfast and dinner. All inclusive: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Breakfast and lunch and dinner only in selected restaurants or bars. Water, soft drinks, coffee and tea, beer, wine, cocktails and national alcoholic drinks at certain times. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Darts (where applicable, for a fee) and table tennis (where applicable, for a fee). Spa area and massages available (where applicable for a fee). Child supervision: babysitting (where applicable, for a fee). Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English, French, Russian and Portuguese. Accepted methods of payment: American Express, Euro / MasterCard and Visa. Villa (BeachFront, Speedboat Included): With kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with shower. Deluxe Villa (BeachFront, Speedboat Included): With kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with shower. Jet Villa (BeachFront, Private Pool - Speedboat): With kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with shower. Guests on any of the above meal plan (Half Board, Full Board) are entitled to dine at Riveli Restaurant. SPEEDBOAT TRANSFERS; -Speedboat transfers rates are applicable for round trip (Male Airport / Angsana Ihuru / Male Airport) and are inclusive of fuel surcharges, whereby the surcharge may change and in this case our reservations will notify the Client in advance. Speedboat transfers will be arranged by the resort on behalf of the Client hence the resort will require guests’ information upon reservation. -Cancellation with less than 96-hours’ notice prior to the date of the transfer will be subject to 50% of the applicable rate. No-show will be charged at 100% of the rates quoted in the contract. -Speedboat transfers are subject to hotel policies & regulations; the Hotel reserves the right to adjust the rates accordingly. INCIDENTS: Restrictions - Rooms - Comment:Beachfront Jet Pool Villa doesn't have private pool but it has a private jet tub pool

records.short_description: Chic resort with shuttle service, fitness center and meeting room
